content: +description this is a crochet pattern for the haven cardigan an oversized and airy spring cardigan that will pair perfectly with all your favorite outfits it is made up of simple half_double_crochet double_crochet and puff stitches which adds to the overall unique boho beauty of this design from a cozy day on the couch to a night out on the town to your everyday wear this cardigan is truly something that you need in your wardrobe +what you will get a thirteen page color coded pdf written in standard us terms which includes photo tutorials for every step of the pattern this pattern includes instructions for sizes xsmall- 5xl +skill level this is a beginner level pattern +materials *approximately 1100-2200 yards of worsted weight yarn depending on size *size k 6 5 mm crochet hook *stitch markers *yarn needle +more check out more of cactus and lace designs patterns here https //www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns if you have any questions or difficulties with this pattern at all please don t hesitate to message me i would love to help answer any of your questions +share your work don t forget to follow along on social media to receive updates and to share your work instagram @cactus and lace ravelry ravelry com/people/cactusandlacedesigns pinterest please tag me @cactus and lace in your pictures of your finished items i would love to see and share them and don t forget to use the hashtag #cactusandlacedesigns +pattern copyright please do not copy redistribute or sell my pattern in any way i hope you enjoy your finished haven cardigan if you choose to sell the finished product please credit me ashley cobb of cactus & lace designs and provide a link to www etsy com/shop/cactusandlacedesigns in your listings so that other makers can find me as well thank you for understanding
